verses.verse: Awake, <WH5782> awake; <WH5782> put on <WH3847> thy strength, <WH5797> O Zion; <WH6726> put on <WH3847> thy beautiful <WH8597> garments, <WH899> O Jerusalem, <WH3389> the holy <WH6944> city: <WH5892> for <WH3588> henceforth <WH3254> there shall no <WH3808> more <WH5750> come <WH935> into thee the uncircumcised <WH6189> and the unclean. <WH2931>

Shake thyself <WH5287> from the dust; <WH4480> <WH6083> arise, <WH6965> and sit down, <WH3427> O Jerusalem: <WH3389> loose thyself <WH6605> from the bands <WH4147> of thy neck, <WH6677> O captive <WH7628> daughter <WH1323> of Zion. <WH6726>
For <WH3588> thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD, <WH3068> Ye have sold yourselves <WH4376> for naught; <WH2600> and ye shall be redeemed <WH1350> without <WH3808> money. <WH3701>

For <WH3588> thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD, <WH3069> My people <WH5971> went down <WH3381> formerly <WH7223> into Egypt <WH4714> to sojourn <WH1481> there; <WH8033> and the Assyrian <WH804> oppressed <WH6231> them without cause. <WH657>

Now <WH6258> therefore, what <WH4100> have I here, <WH6311> saith <WH5002> the LORD, <WH3068> that <WH3588> my people <WH5971> is taken away <WH3947> for naught? <WH2600> they that rule over <WH4910> them make them to howl, <WH3213> saith <WH5002> the LORD; <WH3068> and my name <WH8034> continually <WH8548> every <WH3605> day <WH3117> is blasphemed. <WH5006>

Therefore <WH3651> my people <WH5971> shall know <WH3045> my name: <WH8034> therefore <WH3651> they shall know in that <WH1931> day <WH3117> that <WH3588> I <WH589> am he <WH1931> that doth speak: <WH1696> behold, <WH2009> it is I.

How <WH4100> beautiful <WH4998> upon <WH5921> the mountains <WH2022> are the feet <WH7272> of him that bringeth good tidings, <WH1319> that publisheth <WH8085> peace; <WH7965> that bringeth good tidings <WH1319> of good, <WH2896> that publisheth <WH8085> salvation; <WH3444> that saith <WH559> unto Zion, <WH6726> Thy God <WH430> reigneth! <WH4427>

Thy watchmen <WH6822> shall lift up <WH5375> the voice; <WH6963> with the voice <WH6963> together <WH3162> shall they sing: <WH7442> for <WH3588> they shall see <WH7200> eye <WH5869> to eye, <WH5869> when the LORD <WH3068> shall bring again <WH7725> Zion. <WH6726>

Break forth into joy, <WH6476> sing <WH7442> together, <WH3162> ye waste places <WH2723> of Jerusalem: <WH3389> for <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> hath comforted <WH5162> his people, <WH5971> he hath redeemed <WH1350> Jerusalem. <WH3389>

The LORD <WH3068> hath made bare <WH2834> <WH853> his holy <WH6944> arm <WH2220> in the eyes <WH5869> of all <WH3605> the nations; <WH1471> and all <WH3605> the ends <WH657> of the earth <WH776> shall see <WH7200> <WH853> the salvation <WH3444> of our God. <WH430>

Depart <WH5493> ye, depart <WH5493> ye, go ye out <WH3318> from thence, <WH4480> <WH8033> touch <WH5060> no <WH408> unclean <WH2931> thing; go ye out <WH3318> of the midst <WH4480> <WH8432> of her; be ye clean, <WH1305> that bear <WH5375> the vessels <WH3627> of the LORD. <WH3068>

For <WH3588> ye shall not <WH3808> go out <WH3318> with haste, <WH2649> nor <WH3808> go <WH1980> by flight: <WH4499> for <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> will go <WH1980> before <WH6440> you; and the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478> will be your rearward. <WH622>
Behold, <WH2009> my servant <WH5650> shall deal prudently, <WH7919> he shall be exalted <WH7311> and extolled, <WH5375> and be very high. <WH1361> <WH3966>

As <WH834> many <WH7227> were astonished <WH8074> at <WH5921> thee; his visage <WH4758> was so <WH3651> marred <WH4893> more than any man, <WH4480> <WH376> and his form <WH8389> more than the sons <WH4480> <WH1121> of men: <WH120>

So <WH3651> shall he sprinkle <WH5137> many <WH7227> nations; <WH1471> the kings <WH4428> shall shut <WH7092> their mouths <WH6310> at <WH5921> him: for <WH3588> that which <WH834> had not <WH3808> been told <WH5608> them shall they see; <WH7200> and that which <WH834> they had not <WH3808> heard <WH8085> shall they consider. <WH995>
